ComicInfo.Series: Rising Stars: Voices of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary: Lionel Zerb, the Rising Stars "Special" who communes with the dead, has met his match. His minions have been searching for another realm where spirits must go when they finally dissipate from this plane of existence. At long last, one of his minions has found a home where not even the dead dare to enter. Lionel's first encounter with something even MORE frightening than the spirit world begins!
ComicInfo.Title: The House on Stansbury Lane
